name: air
description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as cloud giants, will-o'-wisps, and green and silver dragons.

name: aquatic
description: Creatures that live in watery environments, such as aboleths, crocodiles, lizardfolk, merfolk, octopi, and whales.

name: chaotic
description: Chaotic outsiders, such as chaos beasts, demons, djinni, and slaadi.

name: cold
description: Cold creatures, such as frost giants, ice mephits, and white dragons. Cold creatures are also immune to cold attacks but vulnerable to fire.

name: earth
description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as gargoyles, stone giants, and blue and copper dragons.

name: electricity
description: Creatures such as behirs and storm giants.

name: evil
description: Evil outsiders, such as demons, devils, night hags, and rakshasa.

name: fire
description: Fire creatures, such as fire elementals, fire giants, fire mephits, and red dragons. Fire creatures are also immune to fire attacks but vulnerable to cold.

name: good
description: Good outsiders, such as celestials, couatl, and titans.

name: incorporeal
description: Undead creatures with no physical form, able to pass through solid objects, and only able to be harmed by magic or other incorporeal creatures. Examples include shadows and spectres.

name: lawful
description: Lawful outsiders, such as archons, devils, formians, and rakshasa.

name: reptilian
description: Creatures such as basilisks, kobolds, lizardfolk, and trogolodytes.

name: water
description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as black and bronze dragons.
